snippet: Mitt Romney steals a trick from an unlikely source for his latest campaign ad, but in this case, imitation is more mockery than the sincerest form of flattery.
abstract: Mitt Romney steals a trick from an unlikely source for his latest campaign ad, but in this case, imitation is more mockery than the sincerest form of flattery.

headline.main: New Romney Ad Mirrors 2008 Obama Spot
headline.print_headline: From Obama’s Playbook, Romney Ad on Economy
